name: Florist
text: Ylang Ylang is such a handy plant. Its essential oil can help reduce stress. Smells sweet and fresh as well.

name: Florist
text: It can actually also repel mosquitos. Aside from repelling insects, it also helps balance sebum production in the skin,

name: Florist
